issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Currently the mrapp-generated-classpath file containing the 'built' classpath, which only makes sense during building/testing in the machine where the build happens, is bundled in the hadoop-mapreduce-client-app JAR.

Because the file is bundled in the hadoop-mapreduce-client-app JAR, its contents are added to the classpath of all MR jobs. 

All this entries are useless and just pollute the classpath.

This file should not be bundled in the hadoop-mapreduce-client-app JAR.

As an example, the contents of this file in my local built are:

{code}

fields.summary: hadoop-mapreduce-client-app's mrapp-generated-classpath file should not be in the module JAR
